description:
### Factorial

This challenge is about calculating a factorial of a number. Factorial of a non-negative integer n is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n. Note that the factorial of zero is defined to be one.

Input: A single integer 'n' representing the number (0 <= n <= 10).
Output: Should return an integer which is the factorial of the input number.

Example:

```js factorial(5) // 120 ```
